citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:33 a.m. on
03/07/2016. The inspector knocked at the front door of the residence. After no response the inspector called the
licensee who stated he was currently not in the area.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:33 a.m. on
03/07/2016. The inspector knocked at the front door of the residence. After no response the inspector called the
licensee who stated he was currently not in the area.
